root.name: Under Pressure
root.description: PlotA ship is hijacked, and is sunk on it's way to an underwater military base. Most of the crew and passengers are then infected by a plague which turns them into zombies.GameplayThe player will choose one of four classes, increasing replay value by providing different experiences with each class. The campaign will also be playable in 4-player co-op, each of the players using a different class. The ship, which is approximately a mile long, will be almost fully destructible, with said destruction being persistent. The game also uses the underwater setting in this - if you blow open a window, water will slowly flood that section of the ship, flushing away enemies and Â possibly allowing you to swim to previously inaccessible areas.
